actions.text: Referred to House Committee on International Relations.

official_title: A bill to assist refugees from South Vietnam who wish to return to their native country.

summary.text: Vietnam Refugee Return Act - Expresses the sense of Congress that South Vietnamese refugees who would not be physically endangered by a return to South Vietnam should be offered an opportunity to return to that country. Provides that the President should take steps to determine whether the Government of South Vietnam will permit such evacuees to return. Directs the President to identify those refugees who wish to return. Authorizes the President to provide transportation and make other necessary arrangements for the return of the refugees. Authorizes the appropriation of such sums as may be necessary to carry out the provisions of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to assist refugees from South Vietnam who wish to return to their native country.
